page.title: 20My Village
page.content:
If you wanted to see some sights in this area I would first take you to Askern lake and take you out in a boat and tell you about the mine shaft that is supposed to be somewhere in the murky depths and about the king-size pike which rumours say lurk around the lake. I would then take them to Brocadale Wood and say that it is possible that Robin Hood once lived there.
WRITTEN CONTRIBUTIONS BY: F.Bell,L.Thornley,A.Armstrong, K.Bradwell,R.Bodle,J.Bowden,L.Newton, A.Mulvey,F.Northmore,V.Byrne,J.Dixon, N.Skelton,D.Lockley,C.Saxton,D.Hall, S.Mulvey,A.Fawcett,S.Carrick,K.Cooke, S.Davison,S.Smith. SURVEY BY YEAR 2 CAMPSMOUNT SCHOOL, NORTON,DONCASTER,S.YORKSHIRE.
